channel.title: I need help for Dragon Claws + Emote animation (texthandler)

item.title: I need help for Dragon Claws + Emote animation (texthandler)
item.dc:creator: @innercity innercity
item.description:
@innercity wrote:

I have a deltascape named rune-imune,
i have a few problems,
Dragon claws (Id = 8002)
has 4special attacks
i need 2special attacks how i change it?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 36){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}


I changed emotes into teleports
but how i change the names?
they not in Texthandler. or Clickingmost. Or Client.
Emote Animations:
yes = home case168

no = train case169

think = skill case162

bow = jad case164

angry = kbd case165

cry = pk case161
case 50245: // edgeville teleport
c.teleEffect = 1;
c.sendQuest(“Which wild zone?”, 2470);
c.sendQuest(“Edgeville”, 2471);
c.sendQuest(“Pkbox”, 2472);
c.sendQuest(“Mage bank”, 2473);
c.sendFrame164(2469);
break;

laugh = Monsters case170
c.sendQuest(“Rock crabs”, 15240);
c.sendQuest(“Dagg lair”, 15241);
c.sendQuest(“Island”, 15239);
c.sendQuest(“Cave”, 15243);
c.sendQuest(“Slayer tower”, 15242);

cheer = minigame case171
c.sendQuest(“Barrows”, 15240);
c.sendQuest(“Fight pits”, 15241);
c.sendQuest(“Pest ctrl”, 15239);
c.sendQuest(“Assault”, 15243);

wave = shops case163[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2009, 12:00:29 pm[/size][hr]help someone?

Read full topic
